ing: 1 (32 fluid ounce) bottle cranberry juice cocktail, chilled
2 tablespoons brandy-based orange liqueur (such as Grand MarnierÂ®)
des: "Yummy, spicy, alcoholic punch that never fails to raise the cheer level!"
ins: Mix cranberry juice, orange juice, vodka, orange liqueur, sugar, cinnamon, allspice, and nutmeg in a punch bowl. Refrigerate 2 hours to overnight. Serve punch over ice; garnish with orange slices.
